column1: vEdya
AryapratItyasamutpAdaH nAma mahAyAna sUtram
column2: @195a / /rgya gar skad du /a'arya pra t'i tya sa muta p'a ra da n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra / bod skad du / 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //

column1: evam mayA Srutam
column2: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /

column1: ekasmin samaye BagavAn trAyastriMSAnAm devAnAm maDye viharati sma pANxu kambala kalpe
column2: bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang na /

column1: SilA tale jita aSva Adi mahA SrAvakEH Aryam Etreya avalokita ISvara vajra hasta AdiBiH boDisattvEH mahAsattvEH aprameya guNa ratna alaMkRtEH mahA brahma sahAMpati nArAyaNa maheSvara AdiBiH devEH SakreNa devAnAm indreNa ganDarva rAjena paQcaSiKena ca sArDam
column2: aar mo ni ga lta bu'i rdo leb la rta thul la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams dang / 'phags pa byams pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang; lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pas brgyan pa rnams dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /

column1: aTa avalokita ISvaraH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH utTAya AsanAt eka aMsam uttarAsaFgam kRtvA
column2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga ri rab @195b kyi rtse mo la btsugs te /

column1: dakziNam jAnum meru pRzWe vazwaBya yena BaganAn tena aQjalim praNamya Bagavantam etat avocat
column2: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das /

column1: ete hi Bagavan devAH cEtya namaskriyA maNxanAH etat parizad maNxala patitAH kaTam api
column2: lha 'di dag ni mchod rten bgyid par 'tshal ba sha stag ste / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir mchis na / ci nas tshangs pa'i bsod nams 'phel ba dang / lha dang bcas pa /

column1: brahmacarya puNya prasavAH sa devake samArake sa brahmake loke sa SramaNa brAhmaNa prajAsu
column2: bdud dang bcas pa / tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu las dge slong dang /

column1: BikzavaH BikzuNyaH upAsa kopAsikAH su bahula puNya prasavAH BagavataH Darma deSanAm yAcante iti
column2: dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la chos bstan du gsol /

column1: tadA BagavAn= tezAm pratItyasamutpAda gATAm avocat
column2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa / ye dharm'a he tu pra bha b'a he tunte sh'ana ta th'a ga to hya ba data / te sh'anytsa yo ni ro dha ae bam b'a d'i ma h'a shra mana /

column1: ye DarmAH hetu praBavAH hetum tezAm taTAgataH hi avadat
column2: chos gang rgyu byung de dag gi /

column1: tezAm ca yaH niroDaH evam vAdI mahA ASramaNaH
column2: rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa'ang // de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te // dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs //

column1: yat idam avalokita ISvara ayam pratItyasamutpAdaH taTAgatAnAm Darma kAyaH
column2: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug / 'di lta ste / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku yin te /

column1: yaH pratItyasamutpAdam paSyati sa taTAgatam paSyati
column2: sus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo // spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /

column1: yaH ca avalokita ISvara kula putraH kula duhitA vA SradDA samanvitaH apratizWite pRTivI pradeSe
column2: rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu @196a *// mdo dad pa can gang la la zhig gis mi gnas pa'i phyogs su mchod rten ni skyu ru ra'i 'bru tsam /

column1: Amalaka mAtram cEtyam sUcI mAtram boDivRkzam bakula puzpa mAtram Catram kRtvA pratItyasamutpAda Darma DAtu gATAm paWati
column2: srog shing ni khab tsam / gdugs ni ba ku la'i me tog tsam zhig byas la / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba chos kyi dbyings kyi tshigs su bcad pa nang du bcug na de tshangs pa'i bsod nams bskyed par 'gyur te /

column1: sa brAhmam puNyam prasavati itas pracyAvya maraNa kAlam kRtvA brahma loke utpadyate tatas pracyAvya kAlam kRtvA SudDAvAsa kAyikAnAm devAnAm saBA gatAyAm utpadyate evam avocat BagavAn sa rve ca te SrAvakAH
column2: 'di nas shi 'phos shing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro // de nas shi 'phos te 'chi ba'i dus byas nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro //

column1: te ca boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH sarvAvatI ca sA parzad
column2: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas nyan thos de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag /

column1: sa deva manuzya asura ganDarva lokaH ca BagavataH BAzitam aByanandan
column2: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa mngon par bstod do //
'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
